articles.description: Manchester United look set to complete a third major forward signing in a bid to solve their goalscoring problems - now attention is turning to the midfield.
articles.title: Manchester United transfer news: Carlos Baleba interest highlights midfield need

articles.description: Zak Crawley's sparkling 67 leads Northern Superchargers to a dominant eight-wicket win over Welsh Fire in The Hundred at Headingley.
articles.title: The Hundred 2025 results: Zak Crawley stars as Northern Superchargers race to victory over Welsh Fire

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at how Scott McTominay has become a Ballon d'Or nominee less than a year after leaving Manchester United for Napoli.
articles.title: Scott McTominay: How Napoli midfielder became Ballon d'Or nominee after leaving Manchester United

articles.description: As usual, Glenn McGrath predicts Australia will win the 2025-26 Ashes 5-0 - but says Joe Root and Harry Brook are the England players the hosts will fear most.
articles.title: Ashes 2025-26: Glenn McGrath predicts 5-0 win for Australia

articles.description: Zak Crawley's unbeaten 67 runs off 38 balls, including four sixes, helps Northern Superchargers to an eight-wicket victory over Welsh Fire in their opening match of the Men's Hundred 2025 at Headingley.
articles.title: Men's Hundred 2025: Northern Superchargers vs Welsh Fire - highlights

articles.description: Chelsea are in talks with Manchester United over signing Argentina winger Alejandro Garnacho.
articles.title: Alejandro Garnacho: Chelsea in talks to sign Man Utd winger

articles.description: Five of England's Euro 2025-winning squad are nominated for the Women's Ballon d'Or, with boss Sarina Wiegman among the coaching nominees.
articles.title: Women's Ballon d'Or: Five of England's Euro 2025-winning team nominated

articles.description: World-class professional boxing will return to prime-time television after the BBC signs a broadcast deal with Boxxer.
articles.title: Boxing: BBC to broadcast Boxxer fights on TV and iPlayer

articles.description: New Wales head coach Steve Tandy is excited to have Louis Rees-Zammit back in rugby and could call on the winger in the autumn.
articles.title: Louis Rees-Zammit: Wales open to winger's return in autumn series

articles.description: Chelsea defender Levi Colwill has surgery on a serious knee injury and is expected to miss most of the season.
articles.title: Levi Colwill: Chelsea defender set to miss most of season with ACL injury
